name: Coin Pusher Arcade Game
description:
Coin Pusher is an addictive coin dropping game. It's totally free to play. Play this best coin pusher game today! Enjoying the best coin pusher experience!

How to play
- Coin Pusher is free on all devices.
- Drop gold coins onto the pusher and push the coins off the board.
- Make those coins go into the box to get spin chances!
- Collect the prizes and puzzle pieces that spawn on the machine board to complete prize lines and unlock bonuses!

Join in the fun and play Coin Pusher now!
